msbt.message: Getting close to the start of another Bug-Off! Are you as excited as I am, ?
It's just about time for today's Bug-Off! Hope we each catch lots!
The Bug-Off starts at nine this morning, so there's still time to get ready!
Are you netting lots of bugs? I'm just hoping I can catch up before the 6 o'clock deadline!
Bug-Off days are so exciting! I'm not the best at netting bugs, but I'll still try to catch a bunch!
Everyone's been sighting rare bugs on the island recently. Hope we can each catch a lot of them!
Today's Bug-Off was lots of fun! I can't wait until the next one.
I'm already sad that the Bug-Off is over. I had a good time, though!
How was your Bug-Off?I caught more than I expected to. Maybe I'm actually getting better?
Having any luck out there? I just hope I can keep up with everyone, !
I studied my field guide to insects really carefully, so I think I have a great knowledge of the subject. If only that translated into being any good at catching them
Insects have so many interesting shapes! Sometimes I lose track of time, just obsessing over them. That kind of works against me being able to keep my numbers up in the Bug-Off,
! Hope you're netting lots of bugs, !
